profile_bio.description: We bring together the best of technology and our people to supercharge progress.

text:
Our commitment to sustainability yielded impressive results in our renewable energy consumption, waste reduction and community engagement efforts, among others, in FY24. Here are a few key achievements:

Reduced energy consumption by 26% (baseline FY20) ⚡️
Increased renewable energy consumption by 6% (baseline FY20) ⚡️
Reduced Scope 1 and 2 emissions by 25% and Scope 3 emissions by 29% (baseline FY20) 💨
Recharged over 32 times the water we consumed in India 💧
Planted over 2.12 million saplings 🌳
Created or rejuvenated 243 water bodies 🌊

Discover more in our full report: https://t.co/Vmz3lNteDP
